source_sentence: 爾時妙色那羅延執金剛神(至)而說頌言。
translation: It was then that the wonderfully colored Nārāyaṇa took hold of the vajra spirit (to) and spoke in verse, saying.

source_sentence: 汝應觀法王法王法如是(至)示佛所行處。
